Event Series
LGA Ladies 18 Hole League
LGA Ladies 18 Hole League
All players must have a GHIN Handicap and be listed on the Heritage Landing Club roster to participate. This league is open to female golf members and transfer tenants. We play a variety of FUN games and the weekly fee is $6.00 to participate. Invitations are sent through the Golf Genius Tournament Software every Tuesday […]
